content: Today, we're pleased to report continued strong performance in the first quarter, with distributable earnings of $0.52 per share, a 21% increase over last year, continued growth in net investment income, up 41% from last year and up 10% from Q4 2021, also a dividend of $0.375 per share. Lastly, distributable net investment income was over $42 million in the first quarter, reflecting year-over-year growth of 41%, driven by a larger portfolio and ongoing strong margins.
